4.description: Your friend sets the bet amount (minimum 2)

5.title: Place your bets
5.description: Both players bet a number from 2 to (betAmount - 1)

6.title: The winner is decided!
6.description: If Bet₁ == Bet₂ OR Bet₁ + Bet₂ == BetAmount → The Challenged must complete the challenge!
